assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext initializes with "light" theme by default if no localStorage or system preference
assertionResults.title: initializes with "light" theme by default if no localStorage or system preference

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext initializes with theme from localStorage if available
assertionResults.title: initializes with theme from localStorage if available

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext initializes with system preference "dark" if localStorage is not set and prefers-color-scheme is dark
assertionResults.title: initializes with system preference "dark" if localStorage is not set and prefers-color-scheme is dark

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext initializes with "light" if localStorage is not set and prefers-color-scheme is light
assertionResults.title: initializes with "light" if localStorage is not set and prefers-color-scheme is light

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext toggleTheme switches theme from light to dark and updates localStorage and html class
assertionResults.title: toggleTheme switches theme from light to dark and updates localStorage and html class

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext toggleTheme switches theme from dark to light and updates localStorage and html class
assertionResults.title: toggleTheme switches theme from dark to light and updates localStorage and html class

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext theme is applied to html element correctly on initial load (dark)
assertionResults.title: theme is applied to html element correctly on initial load (dark)

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeContext theme is applied to html element correctly on initial load (light)
assertionResults.title: theme is applied to html element correctly on initial load (light)

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeToggleButton renders correctly and displays moon icon for light theme
assertionResults.title: renders correctly and displays moon icon for light theme

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeToggleButton renders correctly and displays sun icon for dark theme
assertionResults.title: renders correctly and displays sun icon for dark theme

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeToggleButton clicking the button calls toggleTheme and changes the icon
assertionResults.title: clicking the button calls toggleTheme and changes the icon

assertionResults.fullName: ThemeToggleButton button has basic accessibility attributes
assertionResults.title: button has basic accessibility attributes
